name: Modem
description:
Modem was created for the Texas SkillsUSA program and won third place at the state level. The game is a short and simple prototype for a metroidvania.

 All aspects of the game were created by a team of two. 

Bryce Bucher - Director, Modeler, FX, Programmer, Texture Artist

Connor Siegel - Modeler, Texture Artist, Music
